headline: 3M: share price advances, a 'buy idea' according to Deutsche Bank
summary: 3M shares bucked Wall Street's trend on Monday, posting one of the Dow Jones index's strongest gains on the back of favorable comments from Deutsche Bank, which described the stock as a buy idea in...
